quest.name: Manusyan for a Day
journal:
Maru needs someone to investigate a piece of troubling news.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: While wearing the disguise and with the chat mode in Say, enter “Your god is come” to call out to the foreboding figure.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: One of our Riders sent word about a strange figure harassin' him durin' a delivery in the Shroud of the Samgha. Might be yet another rovin' Gajasura out for “conquest”...or, knowin' him, just shadows playin' tricks on the eye.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Still, I ain't about to ignore his cry for help, no matter how prone to panickin' he might be. Mind goin' over there and checkin' up on him? If this “figure” is somethin' we should worry about, I trust you'll find the best way to handle it.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you! My savior! Please do somethin' about that stranger followin' me!

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: They keep bangin' on trees and callin' out to the Manusya. I dunno what they want from 'em, but it can't be good! I swear I heard that voice comin' from every direction at once...

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: They scared me so bad I ran all the way here, an' I ain't keen on goin' back out again. Can't deliver nothin' with those whispers stalkin' my every step.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: I'd put my pana on it bein' one of those no-good Gajasura the boss was talkin' about. That means dressin' up as a divinity's the only way to get through to 'em─accordin' to Ogul, anyway.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: I crafted a guise just like she said, an' I've been bringin' it everywhere in case someone brave enough to wear it came by. Maybe if you put it on an' tell 'em, “Your god is come,” or somethin' mystical like that, you can get 'em to let me deliver in peace.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must continue wearing the Manusya disguise in order to progress.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will change back to your normal garments if you move too far away. Look to your map for the garment change's area of effect.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the perturbed Rider to restore or prolong the garment change.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Looks like the disguise fits you perfectly, eh? If you find that Gajasura, start proclaimin', “Your god is come,” and do whatever it takes to get 'em to stop scarin' me half to death.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Ready to play at bein' divine? Well then, put this on!

dialogue.name: SAYTODO
dialogue.text: Your god is come

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: ...O divine that guide! Heed woeful plea!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “Your god is come” to assert your divinity.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must wear the Manusya disguise in order to progress.

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: O divine Manusya! Here after search for so long! Please...listen to problem. Big problem!

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: Talk hard. No can make friends. What do?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Just approach with a smile.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Just be kind.

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: Advice good! Divine Manusya wise. Thanks to Manusya!

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: Thank you, O divine! Question awkward, but... All Gajasura in village walk naked, but here Matanga cover bodies... What do?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Just be yourself.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Why not try a leaf?

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: Manusya wisdom precious indeed! Try advice! Thank you, O divine.

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: See pretty Au Ra in Palaka village...heart pounding in chest. But Au Ra are hated of Gajasura. Not know what feel...

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: It's time to forget the hatred you feel toward the Au Ra.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Why not gift her some beautiful flowers?

dialogue.name: GAJASURA04577
dialogue.text: Oh, the insight of divinities! Will try hard to follow. Thank you!

dialogue.name: ARKASODARA04577
dialogue.text: Bless me with your wisdom, divine Manusya! Hear my words!

dialogue.name: ARKASODARA04577
dialogue.text: That voice...? You're Forename, aren't you!? What in the world are you doing dressed like that?

dialogue.name: ARKASODARA04577
dialogue.text: Oh, a fellow Arkasodara was frightened by my prayers? My apologies, but I often recite my prayers absent-mindedly while I go about my work gathering herbs.

dialogue.name: ARKASODARA04577
dialogue.text: The alchemists of the Great Work often call out to the island's divine protectors so as to receive their blessing. However, I now realize how passersby may get the wrong impression... I shall be more mindful in the future!

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Did you find that terrible monster!? Did you!? Please say yes!

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Ah, so my life wasn't in danger... Good news, to be sure. Thanks for investigatin' in my stead.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: You can tell Maru I'll be deliverin' that shipment just as soon as my heart stops poundin' from the terror of it all.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04577
dialogue.text: Looks like I can continue with the delivery... Soon as I get a moment to calm down, that is. Tell Maru I won't be long!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: So, did you find out who our mysterious figure was?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: As I suspected, a whole pile of nothin'. Still, better that than monsters, or worse─more food thieves! We should be givin' thanks to the divinities for their protection.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: An' to you, of course. I'll try to get our mutual friend to stop jumpin' at every sound he hears, but I wouldn't count on it...
